message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40% - we both walk away with something.
I think it's fairer to split it closer to the middle.  I'll take 5500, leaving 4500 for you.  Let's end this quickly.
Bob, my friend, this isn't going anywhere fast.  Let's be realistic - time is money, and we're both losing out. I'll take a smidge less than my first offer, you get a bit more than your offer. Deal?
